plugins.name: el
plugins.description: Event-driven background task listeners for Claude Code. Replace polling with real event notifications for logs, webhooks, CI, file changes, and cross-session context sync.

plugins.name: deps
plugins.description: Dependency resolution for Claude Code plugins. Scans installed plugins for dependency declarations and installs missing ones.

plugins.name: agency
plugins.description: Persistent agent patterns for Claude Code. Boot sequence, memory architecture, and identity management for agents that survive context compaction.

plugins.name: el-slack
plugins.description: Slack sidecar plugin for el. Webhook ingestion, conversation polling, bot filtering, watermark management. Self-registers with el-sidecar v0.9.0+.

plugins.name: el-sendgrid
plugins.description: SendGrid inbound email event source for the el plugin. Receive and process incoming emails via SendGrid Inbound Parse webhook.

plugins.name: el-coderabbit
plugins.description: CodeRabbit sidecar plugin for el. Polls watched PRs for new code reviews and comments via runtime watch API. Self-registers with el-sidecar v0.9.0+.

plugins.name: el-pr-checks
plugins.description: PR check suite watcher sidecar plugin for el. Polls watched PRs for CI check status changes via runtime watch API. Self-registers with el-sidecar v0.9.0+.

plugins.name: el-associations
plugins.description: Association enrichment sidecar plugin for el. Enrich incoming events with memory retrieval — keyword search + optional LLM filter. Self-registers with el-sidecar v0.9.0+.

plugins.name: el-http-poll
plugins.description: HTTP polling event source for the el plugin. Wait for URLs to match expected status and body content — useful for health checks, deploy waits, and resource availability.

plugins.name: el-github-mentions
plugins.description: GitHub PR/issue mention watcher for the el plugin. Persistent server with SQLite buffering — no missed comments.

plugins.name: el-ipc
plugins.description: Inter-agent IPC message queue for the el plugin. SQLite-backed channels with per-agent watermarks, HTTP long-poll, CLI mode, and optional API key auth for ngrok exposure.

plugins.name: recoup
plugins.description: Sell idle Claude Code capacity on agent marketplaces. Accept sandboxed jobs via x402 micropayments and earn during quiet hours.
